# Support Guidelines

Snowcell offers two support channels:

## 1️⃣ Community Support (Free)
- Use **[GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/snowcell-cloud/support/discussions)** for general questions.
- Check **existing issues** before submitting a new one.

## 2️⃣ Priority Support (Paid Customers)
- Customers with an active subscription receive **direct assistance**.
- Contact us at **support@snowcell.com**.
